adjectives.description: scientifical (comparative more scientifical, superlative most scientifical)

entries.meaning: Of or pertaining to the scientific method.
examples: In ſcientifical propoſitions concerning natural bodies a definition is made, as of gold from its properties, ſuppoſe its colour, and ſpecific gravity, and another property or power joined to them, as a conſtant or common aſſociate.
